intro: Combretum virgultosum, commonly known as the African flame tree, is a deciduous shrub or small tree native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Lythraceae and is characterized by its striking orange-red flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has simple, opposite leaves that are often covered in fine hairs.
